item.title: I am reading....
item.description: 2024 [] - The Progamatic Programmer [] - A Mind for Numbers by Barbara Oakley [] - Software Architecture: The Hard Parts by Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Pramod Sadalage, Zhamak Dehghani [] - Go in Practice by Matt Butcher and Matt Farina To Read List Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking by Malcolm Gladwell Thinking, Fast and Slow by Daniel Kahneman The Catalyst: How to Change Anyone‚Äôs Mind by Jonah Berger Biased: Uncovering the Hidden Prejudice That Shapes What We See, Think, and Do by Jennifer L.

item.title: Who am I?
item.description: I’ve been working in the industry as a software engineer and a consultant for almost a decade now in various deciplines. I mainly work with Go, Python, AWS/GCP and Orchestration (k8s/nomad) nowadays, but always on the lookout to learn new things. During my free time, I run my blog at datagenx where I share my learnings and tutorials to help developers around the world. üìù I blog here: https://www.datagenx.net/ üí¨ Ask me about Cloud, Orchestration (k8s/Nomad), Cloud Architecture, and Databases üì´ Follow me on Twitter @datagenx and LinkedIn @atulsingh0 I can advise on - Still in learning mode for Few more tools where I spend most of my day -
